P

parseClient(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.parsers.GsonParser
Analyzes Json data on the client side, returning an instance of the corresponding class, with a bunch of information describing a certain event (someone disconnected, a player made a move etc.).
parseController(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.parsers.GsonParser
Analyzes Json data on the server side, returning an instance of the corresponding class, with a bunch of information describing a certain event (i.e. a move from a player).
PassMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller
Notifies the controller that a player intend to end his turn.
PassMessage() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller.PassMessage
Class constructor.
Player - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
Represents a player and contains all the necessary flags to handle the phases of the match (initial phase, first turn, playing phase) and the actions of the turn (die placement, use of a tool card).
Player(String, WindowPattern, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
Constructor specifying username, window pattern and ID of the player.

PublicObjective - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.objectives.publicobjectives
Public objectives are selected at the start of the match and every player gets some point from each objective based on the status of its window pattern at the end of the game.
